definitions.definition: A close embrace, especially when charged with such an emotion as represented by: affection, joy, relief, lust, anger, agression, compassion, and the like, as opposed to being characterized by formality, equivocation or ambivalence (a half-embrace or "little hug").
To crouch; huddle as with cold.
To embrace by holding closely, especially in the arms.
definitions.example: Billy hugged Danny until he felt better.

definitions.definition: To stay close to (the shore etc.)
To hold fast; to cling to; to cherish.
